textAfterTable: Caregiver Stories He Disguised it Well . . . But I Knew My husband disguised it well, but I knew. I had known for the last seven or eight years. He was sixty-five and I was forty-seven. We had been married for sixteen years. The eighteen years between us never made a difference. Read More Sponsors & Special Events
